channel.title: Components on ScrapComputers
channel.description: Recent content in Components on ScrapComputers

item.title: Antenna
item.description: Description The antenna component is connected to a network port. If connected, You would be able to send data to other antenna’s wireless!

item.title: Camera
item.description: Description The camera allows you to take screenshots or even render video from the world to your display! Our camera looks great while not even touching the raytracing.

item.title: Display
item.description: Description The display is like a monitor but in Scrap Mechanic. Allows you to draw anything on it with a computer.

item.title: Drive
item.description: Description A drive allows you to store anything* inside it. You can also go interact with it to modify its data there without doing it via code.

item.title: Hologram
item.description: Description The hologram are like Display’s but instead of being in 2D, Its in 3D. You can r Functions createCube Hologram.

item.title: Keyboard
item.description: Description It’s like a virtual keyboard! You can interact with it and then type anything and the computer will be able to read it!

item.title: Laser
item.description: Description The Laser is like a normal scrap mechanic sensor but instead of ON or OFF, It provides more information which could be useful for things like Robot kinematics (More like Sensor-Enhanced Kinematics)

item.title: Motor
item.description: Description The motor allows you to control what the bearings and pistons should do. Functions setBearingSpeed Motor.setBearingSpeed( speed ) Sets the bearing(s) speed

item.title: Network Port
item.description: Description The network port allows you to send data to other network ports. Functions getAntenna NetworkPort.getAntenna() Gets the connected antenna

item.title: Radar
item.description: Description The radar allows you to detect objects around you. Structure Target A target is an object detected from the radar
